dimensions:
L: 52 in. (back neck to hem)
Center back length - 52"
		Shoulder to hem back length - 53"

title: evening dress
materials:
Fiber content label states - nylon (53%) and metal (47%)
The fabric has a knit foundation with overall surface loops of flat strips of a shiny plastic material reminiscent of audio tape (perhaps the 47% metal labeling refers to a metal oxide on a synthetic film substrate?)
